JobFullDesc:
ActZero is a well-funded cybersecurity company entering hyper-growth mode. Our market leading, award-winning offering is a Managed Detection and Response (MDR) service that combines cybersecurity experts with sophisticated AI technology to protect our customers’ networks, clients, employees, and brands.

We’re a team of diverse and creative analysts, scientists, marketers, and engineers with a passion for cybersecurity. Our team has led cybersecurity at the White House, led NVIDIA’s cloud platform, created cloud-services at Amazon, and directed product for DARPA’s Foundational Cyber Warfare Program.

As the Director of Security Operations reporting to the Head of Operations, your job is to lead our team of talented security professionals that deliver and evolve our MDR Service. As part of a hyperscale company, you will innovate beyond traditional SOC practices, and help the Head of Operations build a new standard of cyber service delivery. Your work here will provide a unique perspective to enable Product to develop new features and detections with high-efficacy and high-efficiency. You will also be building out this team in line with our values and culture, to support this evolution. This role, while remote, is based around ActZero’s Toronto hub.

While we’re a small and rapidly growing team, we have the stability and funding of a series B company. We believe in doing the best work of our careers in a collaborative environment supported by work-life balance, great benefits, a stable work environment, and building a culture led by our values.
As the ActZero Director of Security Operations you will:

Direct and lead global security operations in our hyperscale initiatives
Evolve our 24/7 incident response capabilities to achieve our company-level response OKR
Work closely with Product, as the trusted voice of Security Operations, in feature and detection development.
Be responsible for ensuring the high quality and effectiveness of service for our customers.
Recruit and manage our fully-remote security operations personnel.
We would like to speak to you if you:

Develop and optimise new frameworks, and are excited to solve security operational problems alongside R&D teams.
Are a credible security practitioner, particularly in the areas of threat detections and investigations.
Enjoy operating in and building out world class 24/7 incident response teams.
Enthusiastically hire and retain engaged security professionals.
You are committed to both professional development and business growth in a rapidly expanding market
The ability to deal with ambiguity, communicate well with partner teams, and a compassionate understanding of the customer experience
